message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_IN_THIS_STATE
message.locale: You are not allowed to modify a record when it is in this state.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_DELETE_IN_THIS_STATE
message.locale: You are not allowed to delete a record when it is in this state.

message.name: ERR_WRONG_USER
message.locale: Cannot submit an application or screening with this user name.

message.name: ERR_FV_SCHEMA_REQUIRED_WHEN_QUESTION_SCRIPT_ENTERED
message.locale: If a Question Script is specified a Schema must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_QUESTIONSCRIPT_REQUIRED_WHEN_SCHEMA_ENTERED
message.locale: If a Schema is specified a Question Script must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_QUESTIONSCRIPT_REQUIRED_WHEN_ANSWER_SCRIPT_ENTERED
message.locale: If an Answer Script is specified a Question Script must be specified.
